summary:
ORACLE - about

 tokenomics - Our advanced AI Analysis and Trading Platform is on the horizon, exclusively
for 0xOracle token holders. This cutting-edge platform will offer unparalleled
market insights and trading capabilities, powered by sophisticated AI
algorithms. Stay tuned for this exclusive access, and make sure you’re part of
the 0xOracle token family to unlock the future of crypto trading!

 how to buy - 1. Create a wallet

Install Metamask For Free On Desktop Or Mobile And Follow Their Simple Setup
Instructions

2. Get $ETH

Add $Eth (Erc-20) Into Your New Wallet By Purchasing Directly Or Transferring
From An Exchange (Ex. Coinbase)

2. Go To Uniswap

Open Uniswap And Connect Your Wallet. Copy The 0xOracle Token Address Into
Uniswap And Approve Your Wallet When Prompted.

4. Swap $ETH for Oracle

 contact - ask@0xoracle.com
